EmailTemplate.subject: The future is what we all make it
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello again {{lead.First Name}},
As we all work through these current challenges, we know that a bright, optimistic future is ahead. We stand ready to support you as you return to flying.
As the world adapts to new realities, we too are finding new needs and new answers throughout our industry. A new future means new answers. In this environment, transforming the future means learning and changing what we can today, and weâ€™re honored to include you as part of this!
With warm regards,
Bill Kircos Vice President, Customer Marketing Honeywell Aerospace
